app.title: El Hornito - Fridge to Recipe AI
app.description: Transform your fridge contents into delicious recipes with AI. Upload a photo of your fridge and get personalized recipe suggestions instantly.
app.keywords: recipe, AI, cooking, fridge, ingredients, food, Claude AI
app.author: El Hornito Team
app.ogDescription: Transform your fridge contents into delicious recipes with AI
app.ogAlt: El Hornito - Fridge to Recipe AI
app.twitterDescription: Transform your fridge contents into delicious recipes with AI

hero.title: Transform Your Fridge Into Amazing Recipes
hero.subtitle: Upload a photo of your fridge contents and let our AI chef create personalized recipes that make the most of what you already have. No more food waste, just delicious meals!

takePhoto.title: 1. Take a Photo
takePhoto.description: Snap a clear photo of your fridge contents or pantry items

aiAnalysis.title: 2. AI Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Our AI identifies ingredients and considers your preferences

getRecipe.title: 3. Get Recipe
getRecipe.description: Receive a personalized recipe with step-by-step instructions

footer.tagline: Transforming fridges into feasts with the power of AI

onboarding.welcomeDescription: Get personalized recipe recommendations by setting up your cooking preferences and dietary restrictions.
onboarding.enhanceDescription: Complete your profile to get even better recipe suggestions tailored to your tastes and equipment.

fridgeUploader.analyzingMessage: Our AI is analyzing your fridge contents and creating a perfect recipe just for you!
fridgeUploader.dragDrop: Drag & drop or click to browse (JPEG, PNG, WebP up to 10MB)
fridgeUploader.tipText: Set your preferences in settings to get more personalized recipes!
fridgeUploader.personalizedRecipeDescription: The AI will use your saved preferences and dietary restrictions from your settings to create a customized recipe.

recipe.noRecipeDescription: Upload a photo of your fridge to get started with AI-powered recipe suggestions!
